word:
"Many of the sick and suffering will turn from the cities of the country, refusing to conform to the habits, customs, and fashions of city life; they will seek to regain health in some one of our country sanitariums. Thus, though we are removed from the cities twenty or thirty miles, we shall be able to reach 
                                                                           402
the people, and those who desire health will have opportunity to regain it under conditions most favorable.
